BANK HOLIDAY: 27 April 2022 – SEPA payments paused
Due to the upcoming Slovenian Bank Holiday on Wednesday, April 27, Bitstamp’s SEPA incoming and outgoing payments will be paused.
BANK HOLIDAY: 15 and 18 April 2022 – SEPA payments paused
Due to the upcoming Slovenian Bank Holidays on Wednesday, April 27 and Monday, May 2, Bitstamp’s SEPA incoming and outgoing payments will be paused.
BANK HOLIDAY: 21 February 2022 – USD payments paused
Due to the upcoming federal US holiday on Monday, February 21, Bitstamp’s USD incoming and outgoing payments will be paused.
Due to database changes to support additional assets, all our services and features will be temporarily unavailable on Wednesday, February 16, beginning at 9 AM UTC.
BANK HOLIDAY: 17 January 2022 – USD payments paused
USD deposits and withdrawals will be paused Monday, Jan 17, due to the public holiday in the US.
Scheduled maintenance on 5 January at 8:00 AM UTC
Due to scheduled infrastructure upgrades, all our services and features will be temporarily unavailable on Wednesday, January 5th, beginning at 8:00 AM UTC.
Multiple user login is now live for corporate accounts
We now support separate logins for all the companies who wish to provide individual access for their employees to the same corporate account.
Withdrawal fees for some of our assets increased
We’re introducing changes to withdrawal fees for some of the assets at Bitstamp.
Due to scheduled infrastructure upgrades, all our services and features will be temporarily unavailable on Wednesday, November 24, beginning at 9 AM UTC.
BANK HOLIDAY: 25 November 2021 – USD payments paused
Due to the upcoming federal US holiday on Thursday, November 25, Bitstamp’s USD incoming and outgoing payments will be paused.
